original_title: JUGGS Live: Going a Little Blue / Balls to the Wal
overview: JUGGS' follow-up to his best selling act, "Blow Me. the end." JUGGS unveils his new act, "Going a Little Blue / Balls to the Wall," in the waiting room of a quick lube. His stand-up will have you lol'ing the whole time!
title: JUGGS Live: Going a Little Blue / Balls to the Wal
